properties.name: BLR267
properties.notes: 18/03154/FULM, Demolition of all existing buildings (excluding Warwick Court) and provision of 320 residential units in 5 blocks varying between three and nine storeys high, together with associated parking, cycle parking, hard and soft landscaping, play space, access and utilities. The scheme is subject to minor amendments as follows: Amendment to application site boundary; Minor changes to the public realm; Confirmation of temporary access arrangements for Warwick Court; Incorporation of bulky waste storage room within Block B; Inclusion of missing door to Block D plant room; Block B podium entrance pushed south to create a recessed entrance; Omissions of misplaced door swings on upper levels; Double door entry provision to all cycle stores; Removal of illustrative double stacker cycle storage equipment from each cycle store.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.name: BLR268
properties.notes: 18/03034/FUL, Alterations to existing building to provide 6 light industrial (Class B1) units at ground floor with provision of communal refuse and bike store and 31 live/work (Sui Generis) units to upper floors (comprising 20 x 1 bed and 11 x 2 bed units), including internal alterations, refuse storage area, alterations to fenestration including insertion of various new entrances, formation of terraces and insertion of rooflights to front and rear roof slopes.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority
properties.site-address: Europa House Europa Trading Estate, Fraser Road

properties.name: BLR269
properties.notes: 18/00203/FULM, Redevelopment of site to provide 42 dwellings comprising 24 x 1 bed flats and 24 x 2 bed flats.with associated landscaping, access and car parking, bin and bike storage areas.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.name: BLR270
properties.notes: 19/01756/PRIOR, Prior Notification for proposed change of use from offices (Class B1a) to 9 x 1 bed self-contained units of accommodation (Class C3).
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority
properties.site-address: Unit 1 Europa Trading Estate, Fraser Road

properties.name: BLR271
properties.notes: 19/02025/PRIOR, Prior Notification for proposed change of use of building from offices (Class B1a) to 17 self-contained studio flats (Class C3).
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.name: BLR272
properties.notes: 19/02213/FUL, Formation of an additional floor and the creation of 6 x one bed and 2 x two bed apartments, with associated parking and bin storage plus the introduction of a lift and shaft and external staircase.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.name: BLR273
properties.notes: 19/02130/FUL, Part 1/2 storey rear extension and alterations to provide a reconfigured commercial unit and 1 x 1 bed and 1 x 2 bed flats on the ground floor and 3 x 1 bed and 1 x 2 bed flats on the first floor.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.name: BLR274
properties.notes: 17/02779/FUL, Demolition of existing dwellings at 5 and 6 Friars Walk and construction of of 2 x three bed and 4 x four bed dwellings with associated parking, amenity space, cycle and bin stores.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.name: BLR275
properties.notes: 18/00440/FULM, Demolition of existing buildings and erection of a four storey development comprising 2 commercial units at ground floor with 6 x 1 bed and 12 x 2 bed apartments above with access through ALDI.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.name: BLR276
properties.notes: 19/01785/FUL, Demolition of existing buildings and erection of two x two/three storey buildings to provide 5 residential units comprising: 2 x 1 bed and 3 x 2 bed flats with associated amenity space.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority
properties.site-address: Parkers Of Bexley Parker House, Bexley High Street

properties.name: BLR277
properties.notes: 19/02292/FUL, Demolition of existing building and erection of a 4 storey building comprising commercial space (Use Class A1/A2) on ground floor and 3 x studio, 3 x 1 bed and 3 x 2 bed apartments with associated parking and amenity space.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.name: BLR278
properties.notes: 19/02274/FULM, Demolition of the existing buildings and erection of 25 dwellings comprising 5 x 4 bed, 7 x 3 bed, 5 x 2 bed houses and 8 x 1 bed supported living apartments together with car parking and associated works.
properties.ownership-status: owned by a public authority

properties.name: BLR279
properties.notes: 19/03029/PRIOR, Notification for Prior Approval for a proposed change of use of a building from Office Use (Class B1(a)) to provide 16 residential units comprising 10 x 1 bed and 6 x 2 bed apartments with associated parking and cycle storage areas and bin storage facilities.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.name: BLR280
properties.notes: 19/02597/FUL, Demolition of six redundant garages and erection of a part two/part three storey building comprising 3 x 1 bed apartments and 2 x 2 bed apartments.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority
properties.site-address: Garages To The Rear Of 3 - 9 Filston Road

properties.name: BLR281
properties.notes: 19/00941/FULM, Demolition of existing buildings, rebuilding of the existing Barn to provide 35 residential units (Use Class C3) as Affordable Homes (Shared Ownership and Affordable Rent) comprising 22 x 2 bed flats, 1 x 2 bed house, 7 x 3 bed houses and 5 x 4 bed houses and provision of car parking, cycle parking, landscaping and associated infrastructure.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.name: BLR282
properties.notes: 18/02745/FULM, Demolition of existing property and erection of a part three/part four storey building comprising of 7 x 2 bed self-contained flats and erection of 3 x 3 bed terraced dwellings with provision of parking and associated works.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.name: BLR283
properties.notes: 19/02955/FUL, Alterations and conversion for the change of use of the ground floor of Block A from shop/retail and non-residential institutions (Class A1/D1) to provide 5 residential units (Class C3) comprising 3 x 2 bed and 2 x 1 bed apartments.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority
properties.site-address: Former Linpac Corrugated Cases Ltd, Richmer Road
